slide.title: What Code Do I Use
slide.subtitle: Code Coverage
slide.blurb: Options to xdebug_start_code_coverage(), both only work for files parsed *from* this moment:

list.bullet: XDEBUG_CC_UNUSED: Enables scanning of code to figure out which line has executable code.
XDEBUG_CC_DEAD_CODE: Enables branch analyzation to figure out whether code can be executed.
